articles.title: Arcturus, Omicron's Offspring: Understanding the New COVID Variant XBB.1.16 - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Arcturus variant of COVID-19, a subvariant of Omicron, has been identified in 34 countries, with India hardest hit. The variant's heightened transmissibility is likely due to its ability to evade immunity from vaccinations and prior infections. While ther…
articles.content:
ByManal Mohammed, University of WestminsterMay 21, 2023
The Arcturus variant (XBB.1.16) of COVID-19, a subvariant of Omicron first identified in India, has now been detected in 34 countries includin… [+3319 chars]

articles.title: MIT GENUS: 40 Hz Vibrations Reduce Alzheimer's Disease Symptoms - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Tactile stimulation improved motor performance, reduced phosphorylated tau, preserved neurons and synapses, and reduced DNA damage, a new study shows. MIT researchers have found that sensory stimulation of 40 Hz gamma frequency brain rhythms using tactile sti…
articles.content:

An MIT study shows that 40 Hz gamma frequency brain rhythm tactile stimulation may reduce Alzheimers disease pathology and symptoms. This extends previous find… [+9573 chars]
